website_summaries.verdict: An ideal palette for creating delicious-smelling, all-natural looks.
pros: Blush has a velvet-like texture, and a little product goes a long way
Palette comes in aesthetically pleasing packaging with a good-sized mirror
Palette is compact and perfect for traveling
Product has a delicious coconut scent
cons: It is easy to apply too much color, but it blends out with no trouble

customer_reviews.title: Excellent pigmented diverse product!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this pallet! I use it for my entire face, highlight, blush and eyeshadow on a daily basis. Each of the colors has so much pigment that I don’t use a lot for each application, which gives added monetary value! I watched several YouTube videos on how to use this pallet in many different ways so it has really replaced quite a few products in my daily make up bag
customer_reviews.author: Aimee Ripley

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What I Wanted
customer_reviews.text: Went to Ulta Beauty but they were sold out. Didn't feel like waiting for their next shipment so ordered here on handy dandy amazon. Looks, smells, and feels to be the real deal. Happy I didn't have to wait long since it's prime!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too frosted not what expected. Great seller.
customer_reviews.text: Not what I hoped for. Nothing bad about the seller but the product I was expecting to be much better for the price. My wife does not like this at all she said too frosted looking.
customer_reviews.author: rob

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the natural face look!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I have been using this for years. It's wonderful for sensitive skin, and I always feel great wearing it. The assortment of blush, highlighter and foundation powders is exactly what I want and need. Thanks for a wonderful product and fast delivery!
customer_reviews.author: Gail D.

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: This product came damaged. Can’t use because I don’t want to risk hurting my face due to glass pieces being in the makeup. Super bummed .....
customer_reviews.author: Mackenzie mulder

customer_reviews.title: The BEST!
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing, color lasts all day, great color scheme, and oddly smells like coconut! So good!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Darcy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful palette with and luxurious smell,pigment and top notch packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Starchaser

customer_reviews.title: Love tis pallet
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful pall, the design is beautiful, the colors are beautiful and it also has a nice smell. Definitely recommend for makeup lovers
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Clymer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: It's the real deal and works really well, smells great
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful palette
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this palette!! Smells awesome and the highlighters are gorgeous!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer C.

customer_reviews.title: Like this so far
customer_reviews.text: I love the smell of this palette, I’m still debating if I love the colors. It might be my inexperience and not knowing how to use. I also love the packaging, very pretty. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Cherie

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived very early and everything way secured nicely and perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Great palette
customer_reviews.text: Love all of the colors in this palette. Such a time saver having eyeshadow, highlight, bronzer and blush all in one.
customer_reviews.author: SJ

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Love I use it not only as a contour pallet but I love them as eye shadows it’s super classy looking I’m in love
customer_reviews.author: Bethany jessup

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I love this palette, so many different combinations to use. Two-Faced palettes are my favorite and the only ones I purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Natural Face Highlight, Blush, and Bronzing Veil Face Palette
product_meta.description: Fall in love with the Too Faced Natural Face Highlight, Blush and Bronzing Veil Face Palette. The first face palette that uses your own natural beauty to luminize, add a bronzing veil and a flirty flush, making all your effortless beauty dreams come true. The velvety-soft formula is infused with hydrating coconut butter and includes multidimensional shades that can be worn all over the face to take your natural beauty game to the next level. Multiple finishes and 6 shades: 2 shimmer highlighters: Starlight (frosted pink champagne) Satin Sheets (frosted golden pink) 2 blushes - 1 matte, 1 satin: Pink Wink (pink coral satin) Pink Sand (matte mocha pink) 2 bronzing veils - 1 satin, 1 shimmer: Sunny Honey (warm ginger natural) Tropic Like It's Hot (spiced terracotta shimmering)
feature_bullets: Infused with hydrating coconut butter for creamy, comfortable wear; Velvety-soft powder that feels lightweight, never cakey; Buildable payoff for a customized natural glow; Complements all skin tones; Cruelty free
